pr_title: DHFPROD-6164: Null JSON node throws error in double metaphone match

timeline.message: DHFPROD-6164: Null JSON node throws error in double metaphone match

timeline.bodyText: One style note - I think comments like this often are better expressed as assertion messages, since if the assertion does fail, the test report shows the very helpful message. No need to change, just a note.
timeline.author: rjrudin
